item.description:
OK, so tubing on the river didn't pan out over the summer....but don't think the winter is going to stop us from trying again. Let's do it in the snow!

I've gone here the past couple of years with my kids....so this is a kid-friendly event and there will be no attendance limit.  The more the merrier!!  It also makes linking tubes up more fun.

We can get a group discount with 15 or more people, and I call ahead to book it with them. The regular rate is $28/2 hrs, group rate is $28/3 hrs.  Group package time is 9-12 on the weekends.  This allows us to relax and have hot cocoa and snack breaks as needed.  I plan to cross post with BPSP and possibly another group as well.  Here's the link to their website:  http://www.skinashoba.com/tubing.html

If Mother Nature doesn't cooperate, we can schedule a different date.
item.name: Snow tubing at Nashoba Valley
